optimized_sql:
WITH filtered_dates AS (
    SELECT d_date_sk, d_year
    FROM date_dim
    WHERE d_moy = 11
      AND d_year = 2002
),
filtered_items AS (
    SELECT i_item_sk, i_category_id, i_category
    FROM item
    WHERE i_manager_id = 1
)
SELECT
    fd.d_year,
    fi.i_category_id,
    fi.i_category,
    SUM(ss.ss_ext_sales_price) AS sum_ss_ext_sales_price
FROM store_sales ss
JOIN filtered_dates fd ON ss.ss_sold_date_sk = fd.d_date_sk
JOIN filtered_items fi ON ss.ss_item_sk = fi.i_item_sk
GROUP BY
    fd.d_year,
    fi.i_category_id,
    fi.i_category
ORDER BY
    SUM(ss.ss_ext_sales_price) DESC,
    fd.d_year,
    fi.i_category_id,
    fi.i_category
LIMIT 100
hint: Isolate filtered date and item dimensions into separate CTEs to enable predicate pushdown and reuse filtered dimension sets before joining with fact tables.
